pages.text: Grade 8 - Integrated Curriculum Chapter 1: Biology - Photosynthesis Lesson 1: Introduction to Photosynthesis Competence: Understand the role of sunlight in plant nutrition Lesson 2: The Chlorophyll Process Competence: Explain how chlorophyll captures light energy Lesson 3: Gas Exchange in Plants Competence: Identify oxygen and carbon dioxide roles Chapter 2: History - The French Revolution Lesson 1: Social Classes Before the Revolution Competence: Describe the three estates and their roles Lesson 2: Economic Crisis Competence: Explain how debt and taxation led to unrest Lesson 3: Political System of the Monarchy Competence: Understand absolute monarchy Chapter 3: Mathematics - Fractions Lesson 1: Understanding Fractions Competence: Identify numerator and denominator Lesson 2: Adding Fractions Competence: Add fractions with same denominator Lesson 3: Multiplying Fractions Competence: Multiply simple fractions Chapter 4: Geography - Climate Zones Lesson 1: Tropical Climate Competence: Identify characteristics of tropical regions Lesson 2: Temperate Climate Competence: Explain seasonal changes Lesson 3: Polar Climate Competence: Describe life in cold regions
